issue.title: Issues attempting to replay Gazebo log file

content.raw: All you need is more ram. My 8GB ram computer shows the same symptoms you describe. However, the same log file running on my new 64GB ram computer executes the playback correctly. (This simulation is a memory hog.) The extra ram also solves the Val-collapse on launching the Qual-tasks better than 60% of the time.
